findings.title: Owners can set up any number of unstake epochs and any burn rate
findings.description: As a result, users may lose all their funds when the unstake function is called.

findings.title: Contracts allows to withdraw all reward tokens from all Farms with a single transaction using the owner address
findings.description: The FarmManager contract's emergencyWithdraw function can be used to withdraw all rewards from all farms in a single transaction, potentially allowing the owner to drain all reward tokens.

findings.title: The newFarm function of the FarmManager has no validation for a farm existence
findings.description: The newFarm function does not check if a farm already exists before adding it to the manager.

findings.title: The add function of the Farm contract has no validation for a staking contract existence
findings.description: The add function does not validate if a staking contract exists before adding it.

findings.title: The deposit function of the Farm contract operates with tx.origin
findings.description: The deposit function of the Farm contract operates with the tx.origin instead of the msg.sender to allow moving from one farm to another.

findings.title: Redundant unstakeAmount Field in UserInfo Struct
findings.description: The unstakeAmount field of the UserInfo struct is redundant and may be removed or replaced with boolean value for a case when withdraw is requested

findings.title: Some code-style issues were found by the static code analyzer
findings.description: Code-style issues detected by a static code analyzer
